HONORABLE MENTION. "Cathedral and Cloister." From the series, "Old
World Backgrounds" of the American School of the Air. Planned and pro¬
duced by the Columbia Broadcasting System. Written by Louis W. Curtis,
directed by Ear 16 McGill and given by Father Finn's Paulist Choristers^
Broadcast November 23, 1937, from 2:30 to 3:00 P.M. over Station WABC,
New York, and the CBS Network.
